    • Method Detail

      • calculatePixels

        private static int calculatePixels(View view,
                                   int sizeInDP)
        Calculate the device dependent pixels to render this view. The size in the designer is given in Density Independent Pixels, and we need to transform that to real pixels depending on the device running the app. The formula is simple: "pixel_size * density".
        Parameters:
        view - the view is needed to grab the Context object
        sizeInDP - the size (in DP) specified in the designer
        Returns:
        size in Pixels for the particular device running the app.
